alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 20 at 8:29PM MST until March 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 7000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches, with 20 to 35 inches above 8500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 to 50 mph Tuesday night and Wednesday. * WHERE...Areas above 7000 feet near Jacob Lake. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. The period of heaviest snow is expected Tuesday through early Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. Additional snow forecast from 8 PM Today to 5 PM Wednesday: Jacob Lake 14 to 20 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
